4.00.text: This is South Park. Monday 8pm.  Most of the public have gone home.

35.04.text: Sleeping bags, Brand new tents by the looks of things.

73.60.text: Its all the same, there's wine, alcohol, gas bottles, tents, camping chairs, trolleys, airbeds.

106.24.text: And this is the best festival in the world. This is the festival that gives you 100 stages.

115.36.text: One band an hour on 100 stages for 3 continuous days. 2 or 3 extra days beforehand with entertainment.

130.40.text: The crew who put this festival on spend all year planning how to make it better than the

140.28.text:
previous years - to make it the best, to give
the public value for money. To make it easy

152.17.text:
for them. Some of the crew have been working
28 hour shifts pulling people out of mud in

162.44.text:
their cars. It is muddy, that's the weather,
that happens at festivals, that's normal.

168.32.text:
but if you can bring it on site on the Wednesday,
you can take it home again on the Sunday or

176.16.text:
the Monday. Its a disposable society. Makes
me sick. And its not just rubbish, rubbish

196.64.text:
is fine. Over there there's a pile of rubbish
that's normal, that happens at my house, stuff

202.62.text:
you don't need you leave it at the end of
the road and the binmen come and pick it up,

207.92.text:
that's normal, that's expected so its not
what the Daily Mail would say apocalyptic.

213.80.text:
Apocalyptic means disaster, that's just normal
rubbish, that's stuff that you've used and

220.44.text:
you don't need the packaging, that's OK. This
- that's not rubbish, that's someones belongings,

226.86.text:
someone has purchased that and its just been
left for someone else to deal with, duvets,

265.92.text:
There are areas to leave your stuff - for charities.There's collection points that you can take
your stuff down, you can fold up your tent,

280.30.text:
put your sleeping bag back in its bag, fold
you up chairs and leave them at the collection

291.04.text:
points, they're next to all the rubbish collection
points or by the stewards caravans.

309.20.text: So its not like there is nowhere to put them. If you wanted to do it, you could.

330.00.text: There is no reason. Absolutely no reason. Completely horrible people doing this. Takers, takers of the system

338.37.text: - not adding anything. Using other peoples energy to clear up after themselves.

359.44.text:
I'm bored now, gonna stop filming, you've seen it, you
know what I'm on about.
